ygData.subject: Re: Greetings from Tallon Zek
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya Zigg, nice to meet you. Interesting question you ask..do I consider you a murderer and plunderer. Nah, not at all. If you prefer pvp over nonpvp that is
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya Zigg, nice to meet you. Interesting question
you ask..do I consider you a murderer and plunderer.
Nah, not at all. If you prefer pvp over nonpvp that is
how you enjoy playing, and that is what the pvp
servers are for. I have made one pvp on Vallon Zek, but
she's still lvl 1 as I don't know the rules for pvp and
wanna check them out before I get to involved..hehe. Oh
I agree 100& on feeding your addiction..I get
withdrawal when I am unable to play.
